entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Privacy Week/Month
entry.summary: The author of the given context suggests that a 'Bitcoin Privacy week or month' should be organized to raise awareness about privacy issues in Bitcoin. The author emphasizes on the importance of privacy and wants users to take it as seriously as security. The author notes that despite positive contributions made towards improving privacy in Bitcoin, they are often overshadowed by influencers with more followers.To support their argument, the author shares a link to a speech from an Indian web series. They encourage developers to help improve privacy by sharing an issue from a Bitcoin project related to privacy, a pull request or anything else they think may help. The author believes that the Bitcoin community needs to come together and work towards improving privacy features. In conclusion, the author advocates for raising awareness about privacy issues in Bitcoin and encourages the community to take steps towards improving it.
